name: nk-airways
description: NK Airways is a full-stack airline reservation system designed to manage flight operations, schedules, pricing, seat allocation, and bookings for both passengers and administrators. The platform is built using a React frontend, a Node.js/Express backend, and a fully normalized MySQL relational database. The system supports secure authentication, real-time seat availability, and a complete booking workflow.

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
